mapper.select: select b.image AS image, b.product_name AS productName, b.product_sn AS productSn, b.cost AS cost, b.shop_count AS shopCount, b.actual_count AS actualCount, b.actual_price AS actualPrice from dj_repair_mend_deliver a inner join dj_repair_mend_materiel b on a.id=b.repair_mend_deliver_id where a.id=#{id}
